attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: let gordon brown call an election,and show the country that they are 100% behind him,and his goverment

rejection.details:
A petition already exists on this subject:

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
